replies.msg:
PGMOL, the body in charge of refereeing in England, says the Mane goal should’ve stood, per commentator @arlowhite

Referee Peter Walton: “The ball came over & Mane is in an offside position but he’s not active so NOT offside. We then enter the second phase of play so as the ball is pushed forward Mane is clearly behind the ball & therefore being played onside. It’s a good goal" #ARSLIV #LFC

replies.msg:
有追但無掂都係越位
球證一般唔吹係因為個波如果出咗界/對面拎返波
對球賽嘅影響不大 又唔使影響流暢度 先至唔吹

好簡單比個例子
如果前面兩個球員一齊追波 越位嗰個追到個波先 但唔掂波 企喺附近等無越嗰個過嚟拎 都係越位 因為會影響到防守球員嘅判斷
